import React, { useState } from "react"; import Loading from "../LoadingError/Loading"; import Message from "../LoadingError/Error"; //import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import moment from "moment"; import "./../../Styles/components/homeTabs.scss"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faCircleChevronRight, faChevronRight, faArrowDownLong, faPowerOff, } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { logout } from "../../Redux/Actions/UserAction"; import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { getTransactionDetails } from "../../Redux/Actions/TransactionAction"; const HomeTabs = (props) => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); const [transactionID, setTransactionId] = useState(); const { loading, error, transactions, userInfo } = props; const latestTransactions = transactions; //.slice(0, 5); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const transactionDetails = (id) => { dispatch(getTransactionDetails(id)); }; const handleLogout = () => { dispatch(logout()); }; return (
{loading ? ( ) : error ? ( {error} ) : ( <>
LOGOUT

Citizen current account

account number: {userInfo.accountNumber}

available balance:
$ {(userInfo.balance + 1000).toLocaleString(undefined, { maximumFractionDigits: 2, })}

Balance:
$ {userInfo.balance.toLocaleString(undefined, { maximumFractionDigits: 2, })}

Date

Description

Amount

{transactions.length === 0 ? (
No transactions
) : ( <> {latestTransactions.map((transaction, index) => (

{moment(transaction.createdAt).format("MM.DD.YYYY")}

{transaction.purposeOfPayment}

${transaction.amount}

))} )}
{/*Modal*/}

Transaction details

Transaction ID:
{transactionID}
)}
); }; export default HomeTabs;
